title: Building height permitted i
clause_text: Building height permitted i.e. Above Ground level (AGL) shall be calculated as CCZM height minus the site elevation of the plot. Height of building (AGL) = CCZM height - site elevation.
section: Restrictions in the vicinity of Airport

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Building height permitted i.e. Above Ground level (AGL) shall be calculated as CCZM height minus the site elevation of the plot.
